name: Guiyang
title: Guiyang - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Guiyang is the capital of Guizhou Province, known as the 'Forest City' for its lush greenery and karst landscapes. Famous for its ethnic minority cultures, including Miao and Buyi minorities, Guiyang offers a unique blend of natural beauty, traditional villages, and modern urban development.

highlights.attractions: Qianling Park, Jiaxiu Pavilion, Qingyan Ancient Town, Huaxi Park
highlights.cuisine: Sour Fish Soup, Guizhou Spicy Chicken, Rice Tofu, Miao Minority Cuisine
highlights.bestTime: Spring (March-May) and Autumn (September-November) with mild weather
